item.title: [CAMEL-9022] JacksonTypeConverter breaks CSV marshalling

comments.comment: Fixed CAMEL-8554 to not be enabled by default.
What is the test data you use for csv? Is it just a string or what data do you send to its marshal ?
I also improved camel-csv to not do the list type conversion as that was wrong. It should iterate the body given in the marshal method as-is.
